name: TeamOut
headline: Online marketplace for team retreat venues
description: TeamOut is a retreat platform for team managers. We offer easy-to-book venues for team retreats. Managers spend months planning for a retreat. We help them do it in just a few days. How? We offer 20+ bedroom private places with robust Wifi that companies can book in a few clicks. This is an incredibly exciting time to meet with your team again, build memorable experiences that your team will remember forever.

founders.name: Thomas Mazimann, Founder
founders.description: CEO @TeamOut / Ex Head of Growth @SaaStr / Ex 1st Employee @Voxeet (Acquired by Dolby Lab)

founders.name: vincent albouy, Founder
founders.description:
- Co-Founder / CPO / CTO @ TeamOut inc
- Worked @IBM @VantAI (Acquired by RoivantScience )
- Software engineer and Machine Learning Scientist
Hold patents and 7 AI papers

generated_description:
**Company Overview: TeamOut**

**Mission**: TeamOut is disrupting the process of planning team retreats by offering an online marketplace where managers can easily book venues tailored for team-building experiences.

**Origin**: Founded in 2021 and an alum of Y Combinator's W22 batch, TeamOut started as a platform dedicated to helping managers find retreat venues more efficiently. By significantly minimizing the planning time—from months to just a few days—they're bringing back the joy of team gatherings in memorable settings.

**Location**: Based in Los Angeles, CA, TeamOut operates with a compact team of 10 dedicated employees.

**Key Offerings**:
- **Venue Sourcing**: Access to over 20+ private venues with robust Wi-Fi, perfect for team gatherings.
- **Comprehensive Planning Services**: Assistance from venue selection to logistics, allowing companies to focus on maximizing team bonding without getting bogged down in details.
- **Diverse Options**: From beachside resorts to mountain lodges, TeamOut has a range of venues designed to cater to different company preferences.

**Why TeamOut?** Retreats are more than just a break from routine; they're vital for team cohesion and productivity. TeamOut helps businesses create lasting memories in an effortless manner. 

### Current Features
- **Self-Service or Full Concierge**: Choose how involved you want to be, whether through a fully hands-off service or a more DIY planning approach.
- **Budget & Flight Estimators**: Tools to understand costs upfront, tailored to your specific needs.
- **Diverse Location Options**: From urban retreats in San Francisco and New York to tranquil settings in the mountains or near the beach.

### Notable Clients
TeamOut has worked with a range of notable companies, including Netflix, Accenture, and PWC, showcasing their capability to cater to the needs of both large and small organizations.

### Growth & Philosophy
With over **500 events** organized in less than two years and a **95% satisfaction rate**, it’s clear that TeamOut is not just filling a niche—it's redefining how retreats are viewed within the corporate environment. The emphasis lies on effective team bonding while ensuring a balanced approach that combines work with enjoyable experiences.

### Closing Thoughts
If you find yourself tasked with planning the next company retreat, TeamOut is your go-to. With their platform, you don’t just book a venue—you craft experiences that strengthen connections and build a cohesive team culture. 

For more information, check out their website: [TeamOut](https://www.teamout.com/)
